title: Did Trump Add 11.6M Jobs to U.S. Economy During Pandemic?
subtitle: U.S. Vice President Mike Pence made the claim during a debate with Democratic rival U.S. Sen. Kamala Harris.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: Because of the work of U.S. President Donald Trump, the American economy added 11.6 million jobs in summer and fall 2020 — regaining nearly half the jobs lost at the start of the COVID-19 pandemic.
